document.full_text: support for california governor jerry brown's plan to shut a $27 billion budget gap has eroded since he introduced it in january, a new poll by the public policy institute of california showed on wednesday.
document.title: support dips for california governor's budget plan
lines_and_colors: support for california governor jerry brown's plan to shut a $27 billion budget gap has eroded since he introduced it in january, a new poll by the public policy institute of california showed on wednesday.
